description:
Kenshin`s final effort to win the ultimate battle ends with Shishio destroying himself. But in the wake of Samurai X`s victory, Shishio`s closest aide vows revenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shouri o Yurusareshi Mono: Shishio tai Kenshin Shuumaku!
The Man who is Chosen for Victory
ปิดฉากการต่อสู้ชิชิโอะหรือเคนชินใครจะชนะ
勝利を許されし者・志々雄 対 剣心 終幕!
